Agent.text: You're going up there to pull that lever, aren't you? You'll blow up this barrel of our finest wine if you do!
Agent.Speaker: demo200cr_bandit

Agent.text: Oh... well, I still can't let you up there. That's where I've stored all the contaminated food.
Agent.Speaker: demo200cr_bandit
Agent.Comment: If the player has a low persuade or better, this line fires. Otherwise, the next one does.

Agent.text: Hey, you're here to shut the tavern down, aren't you?
Agent.Speaker: demo200cr_patron1

Agent.text: But thanks to our new bandit barkeep the place has finally become good!
Agent.Speaker: demo200cr_patron2

Agent.text: 1`politics`I need something...`I'm just going to retrieve the original innkeeper's sword.
Agent.Speaker: PLAYER
